snippet.title: SNES Shadowhawk
snippet.description:
https://www.facebook.com/ShiryuVideoGames/

An unreleased Super Nintendo game based in the comics of the same name, "Shadowhawk" by Jim Valentino. A prototype surfaced in 2003 but it was only last year that Rose Colour Gaming was preparing to sell a 100 limited cartridge run. However Jim Valentino was not so keen on the whole deal and took legal action, despite at least 36 copies of the reproducion cart being sold before sales stooped. That was how the ROM managed to be dumped. There is also small hacks to make this more playable than the original prototype. It's kind of fun  to play, platforming around "Bionic Commando" style with boss fights taking on a one-on-one versus fighting mode. Enjoy!

Read all about this one at SNES Central: http://www.snescentral.com/article.php?id=1095

PS: No, it's not your phones or speakers. The game only outputs mono sound from the left side.
